item.title: You’re not imagining it. Beef prices are up as much as 12% in the past year
item.description: The humble hamburger is at risk of becoming a luxury item.

item.title: Why I’m still working at the age of 73—and yes, I know that sounds horrible to many
item.description: Retirement at 65? The problem is we may live another 20 years—leaving us a lot of time to occupy in a fulfilling way.

item.title: Three CMOs of multibillion-dollar tech companies share the secrets to success they wish all CEOs knew
item.description: The marketing leaders behind CrowdStrike and Snowflake say CEOs need to understand marketing.

item.title: The mental health gaps employers can’t afford to ignore
item.description: If employers want to build resilient, future-ready teams, they must move beyond generic wellness programs.

item.title: First amendment vs. first-person shooter: Uvalde parents battle with ‘Call of Duty’ maker in court
item.description: The parent's lawyer invoked Sandy Hook, saying the shooters shared the same gaming obsession. The Uvalde shooter even searched online for an armored s...
